title: How Do You Tell the Story of Roe v. Wade?
description: A new exhibition at Harvard’s Schlesinger Library looks at how the 1973 Supreme Court decision reshaped American culture and politics.
dc:creator: Jennifer Schuessler
category: Schlesinger Library for the History of Women (Harvard University)
media:credit: Vanessa Leroy for The New York Times
media:description: “The Age of Roe,” an exhibition at Harvard’s Schlesinger Library on the History of Women in America, draws on materials from both sides of the conflict.
